definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]
thriving and prosperous business or trade
see 生機盎然|生机盎然[sheng1 ji1 ang4 ran2]
to undercut competitors/to hustle/to compete for business

sentences.english: He had formerly been in business at Bristol, but failed in debt to a number of people, compounded, and went to America.
sentences.chinese: 在那里他专心一志地做生意，在几年中就赚到许多钱。

sentences.english: My small business operates on a razor-thin profit margin.
sentences.chinese: 我的生意属小本经营，利润微薄。

sentences.english: You need to build a business, not to make new friends on-line.
sentences.chinese: 你需要建立一个生意，不结交新朋在网上。

sentences.english: Many of the Parsee merchants have made great fortunes there by dealing in cotton;
sentences.chinese: 很多帕西商人在印度作棉花生意发了大财。

sentences.english: The key account manager must possess significant skill to run a multi-million dollar business.
sentences.chinese: 大客户经理须具备经营数百万美元生意的重要技能。

sentences.english: The slave might be your business manager, but all the slave could do is the paperwork.
sentences.chinese: 就算他为你管理生意，也只能做做文书工作。

sentences.english: The tradesman was vigorously soliciting for my custom.
sentences.chinese: 那个店主极力向我拉生意。

sentences.english: We are sorry to hear about your business.
sentences.chinese: 听到你生意失败的消息，我们深表遗憾。

sentences.english: In order for you to succeed in this business, your downline must succeed first.
sentences.chinese: 你要想在这生意方面成功，你的下行线一定首先成功。

sentences.english: These people have discovered a key to small business success.
sentences.chinese: 这些人已经发现了小生意成功的关键。

sentences.english: His business was far from being a bonanza !
sentences.chinese: 他的生意还没有走红运。

sentences.english: A:I lost all my investment in the business.
To mark or mottle with spots.
BEFORE the advent of male vanity, the local barbershop used to be a regaling hotspot.
sentences.chinese: 由于男性的虚荣心，当地的理发馆一直以来生意兴隆。

sentences.english: Business is fairly slow; we're just marking time till the economy improves.
sentences.chinese: 现在生意相当萧条，我们正等待经济的好转。

sentences.english: I wish you a succes in your business transaction .
sentences.chinese: 新的一周开开始，大家生意兴隆。

definition: to engage in (business etc)/to run/to operate
to buy and sell/to do business/to trade/to deal
thriving and prosperous business or trade
to trade/to carry out commercial activities/in business
to sell/to betray/to spare no effort/to show off or flaunt
